Version.name: GingerMOD v0.5 (Rom)
Version.item: Based on OFFICIAL XWKI4
Multi CSC
Ported ALL the Mods
Speedier!
More fluid (deals with ondemand governor, trying to resolve)
Best Battery Life!
Disables FullBattery Notification&Sound (thx pulser_g2 for Mod and the help! :D)
Updater SU Binary&App to 3.0
NEW AOSP Bootanimation (Android one)
Removed BootSound (AOSP Does not have it! If you want it just place a PowerON.wav file in /system/etc)
Removed Shutdown Animation (Nice but not AOSP!)
Added Sip over 3G
Added (ported) 9 toggles scrollable from jKay! Great work dude!
Redone Toggles icons by ME
Added Longpress on toggle to have corrispondent settings (Again from jKay!)
Added again Longpress Vol+/- to change songs and -now- also FM station (from jKay!)
ADDED TheGINGERMOD UPDATER APP! OTA UPDATES AND EXTRAS!
Placed Updater and Extras in Settings (instead of in drawer)
Added few new packs:
Updated all packs apps&libs to KI4
Added LGWidgets! (cool widgets works with any launcher!)
Added PolarisOffice (we paid for it! So just use it if you want! :D)
Added jKAY 10.1 pack! Its themed to not alter the AOSP theme but has all feature and setting app! :D
Added COmplete Samsung Hubs/Apps/Accounts pack to have them Back!

Version.name: GingerMOD v0.4 (Rom)
Version.item: Multi CSC
Redone KernelTweaks (faster than ever!)
Redone Dual Core Scripts (Now you choose Freqs with OC-Daemon and Voltages with DualCore scripts!)
Reverted Automatic Backlight Mod (had some problems)
Re-Enabled FastDormancy Menu&Extra with code *#*#9900#*#*
New FuGju Tweaks con parti di Honeycomb 3.1
New I/O Tweaks
New Longpress Vol +/- to change song when screen off-> So many thx aerobahn!
Added AOSP Gallery
Removed Samsung VIDEO/DIVX/Gallery--> There is a package fo that!
Transparent Lockscreen Background by default
Added Possibility to set LockWallpaper going in GingerMOD Extras
Removed Labels from Statusbar power widget (liket it but takes too much space!)

Version.name: GingerMOD v0.3 (Rom)
Version.item: Slimmed down system now only 230mb!!
Update ninphetamine 2.1.3
Update latest gApps 29\07\2011
Updated StatusBar colors look&feel (see screenshots! more AOSP like power widget)
Revised Multimedia quality via build.prop and media_profiles.xml
Revised Automatic Screen brighness level Thx LockedON again! (added more steps, smoother changes!)
Removed Swype keyboard (downloadable as separate pack)
Removed MotionSettings and MobilePrint (downloadable as separate pack)
Added OverClock Daemon! THX rmk40 madmaxx82 mike1986 and Diamondback2010
Added DualCore daemon script! Thx Again madmaxx82!! see in main thread the infos&settings!

Version.name: GingerMOD v0.2.1 (Rom)
Version.item: Upgrade Ninphetamine 2.1.1 (fantastic :O)
GingerMOD Extras-> Mount/Unmount ntfs partition
GIngerMOD Extras-> Switch bootanimation (with one in /sdcard)
PATCH BLN support! Download it separately!
Bugfix-> Resolved Keyboard not Vibrating
Bugfix-> Resized landscape Keyboard (match AOSP one) but bigger in portrait (like before!)

Version.name: GingerMOD v0.2 (Rom)
Version.item: HK3 Modem
Fixed Missing Zipalign binary
Reduced system! Now only 231.8mb Uncompressed!!
Removed Unused Samsung Libs/Files (restored with Feature packs when needed)
INtroduced GingerMODExtras App
Removed ANY Graphic Glitch (Thx to LockedON!!)
Removed Kies Air from Wireless settings (restores original with Kies pack!)
Removed Samsung Apps option from Applications settings
Removed Samsung sound when plug USB
AOSPized Theme Dialer/COntacts (Thx LockedON!)
AOSPized Colors for Notifications (see screenshot! by Me!)
AOSPized Colors Settings (now white not blue! by ME!)
AOSPized Colors TextSelection (Now orange not blue! By ME!)
Added Label for StatusBar power icons (by me, I like it this way xD)
Added EFS Backup thx to Modaco!
Added Fix for Homescreen wakeup lag (thx Oliwe!)
Added More Features Packs Samsung!
Reworked Build.prop and Memory settings to give the MAX of speed and fluidity!

Version.name: GingerMOD v0.1 (Rom)
Version.item: Visual overhaul
Initial Release See Complete Changelog in Official Topic!

Version.name: 0.1-GingerMOD Updater app!
Version.item: First Release
Ported to Galaxy SII
Version number reset
Modified to have Extras tab
ScreenShot Support (for themes for example)
Thx to anyone helped me and made it possible, see the "About"!!
